text: Ara jannatabasigana jahannamabasiderake sambodhana kare balabe, ‘amadera raba amaderake ye pratisruti diyechilena amara to ta satya peyechi. Tomadera raba tomaderake ye pratisruti diyechilena tomara ta satya peyecha ki? Tara balabe, ‘hyam.’ Atahpara ekajana ghosanakari tadera madhye ghosana karabe, allahara la'nata yalimadera upara
